description:
It's that super exciting time of year where Apple announce their new developer goodies!

Watch the live stream with your fellow SWmobile members and discuss the new announcements as they happen! Bonus points if you can spot any SWmobile members who are over in San Francisco in person.

If you haven't heard of WWDC it's an annual developer conference held by Apple in San Francisco, California. The WWDC keynote typically runs through the latest features and developer SDKs for Apple's upcoming OS updates (think macOS, iOS 11, watchOS 4, etc!).

UPDATE: Dyson are very kindly sponsoring food, drink and venue for this one!
title: WWDC Keynote Live Stream
